title: Bug 6410: File appears to be dirtied but not changed after using code assist
description: Bug 6410: File appears to be dirtied but not changed after using code assist
OB: When using code assist in a Java file, the file appears to be dirtied but not changed. Additionally, the code assist does not appear.
EB: After using code assist in a Java file, the file should not appear to be dirtied if no changes were made. The code assist feature should also appear as expected.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open a Java file.
2. Place the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call.
3. Example: consider 'I' to be the cursor below: 
   Object o = anotherObject.method(I);
4. Press Ctrl + Space to trigger code assist.
